request.description:
ðŸ”¹ **Create a new lawyer request**

The authenticated firm user (Admin or Staff) sends a request for a lawyer to join their firm.

- `firmProfileId` is automatically attached from the firm user.
- Default status: `pending`.

ðŸ”¹ **Get all lawyer requests**

Returns all requests belonging to the firm profile of the logged-in user.

No request body required.

ðŸ”¹ **Fetch a single lawyer request** by its ID.

Ensure the firm user belongs to the same `firmProfileId` as the request.

ðŸ”¹ **Update lawyer request status**

You can update the status (e.g.,`pending` `approved`, `rejected`, `left` `cancelled` ) and optionally include `reviewedBy` or `reviewedAt`.

`findOneAndUpdate` uses `$set` to modify only provided fields.

ðŸ”¹ **Delete a lawyer request**

Removes a specific lawyer request under the same firm. Typically used for cleanup or cancellation.

### ðŸ”¸ Description

Creates a new activity log entry for a specific user. This is a universal logging API that supports all modules and activity types (login, update, delete, email, WhatsApp, etc.).

---

### ðŸ”¸ Request Body (JSON)

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `activityNote` | `string` | âœ… Yes | Description of the activity |
| `activityType` | `string` (enum) | âœ… Yes | One of: `"login"`, `"update"`, `"delete"`, `"create"`, `"other"`, `"schedule"`, `"sendsms"`, `"contact"`, `"sendemail"`, `"whatsapp"`, `"pending"`, `"archive"`, `"hired"` |
| `module` | `string` (enum) | âœ… Yes | One of: `"lead"`, `"response"`, `"profile"`, `"message"`, `"order"`, `"payment"`, `"admin"`, `"system"` |
| `extraField` | `object` (optional) | âŒ No | Any additional dynamic data |
| `objectId` | `string` (optional) | âŒ No | Associated entityâ€™s ObjectId (e.g., lead ID, message ID, etc.) |

---

**Headers:**

``` javascript
httpCopyEditContent-Type: application/json

 ```

item.name: Get Dashboard Bar Chart by filter type

request.description:
StartFragment

### **Query Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Allowed Values | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `filterType` | string | âœ… Yes | `yearly`, `six-months`, `three-months`, `monthly`, `fifteen-days`, `seven-days` | `yearly` | Determines the time range for grouping the data. |

---

### **Filter Types Explanation**

| Filter Type | Range Covered | Date Grouping |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `yearly` | Last 12 months | By **month** |
| `six-months` | Last 6 months | By **month** |
| `three-months` | Last 3 months | By **month** |
| `monthly` | Last 1 month | By **day** |
| `fifteen-days` | Last 15 days | By **day** |
| `seven-days` | Last 7 days | By **day** |

EndFragment
